timeSeriesQuery.timeSeriesQueryLanguage:
fetch k8s_container
  | metric 'custom.googleapis.com/opencensus/grpc.io/client/completed_rpcs'
  | filter (metric.grpc_client_status == 'OK')
  | align rate(1m)
  | every 1m
  | group_by
      [resource.project_id, resource.cluster_name, resource.namespace_name, resource.container_name],
      [completed_rpcs_aggregate: aggregate(value.completed_rpcs)]

fetch k8s_container
  | metric 'custom.googleapis.com/opencensus/grpc.io/client/completed_rpcs'
  | filter (metric.grpc_client_status != 'OK')
  | align rate(1m)
  | every 1m
  | group_by
      [resource.project_id, resource.cluster_name, resource.namespace_name, resource.container_name],
      [completed_error_rpcs_aggregate: aggregate(value.completed_rpcs)]

fetch k8s_container
  | metric 'custom.googleapis.com/opencensus/grpc.io/client/completed_rpcs'
  | align delta(1m)
  | every 1m
  | group_by
      [resource.project_id, resource.cluster_name, resource.namespace_name, resource.container_name],
      [error_percentage_aggregate: sum(if(metric.grpc_client_status != 'OK', value.completed_rpcs, 0)) * 100 / sum(value.completed_rpcs)]

fetch k8s_container
  | { t_0:
      metric 'custom.googleapis.com/opencensus/grpc.io/client/started_rpcs'
        | align delta(1m)
        | every 1m
        | group_by
            [resource.project_id, resource.cluster_name, resource.namespace_name, resource.container_name],
            [started_rpcs_aggregate: aggregate(value.started_rpcs)]
      ; t_1:
      metric 'custom.googleapis.com/opencensus/grpc.io/client/completed_rpcs'
        | align delta(1m)
        | every 1m
        | group_by
            [resource.project_id, resource.cluster_name, resource.namespace_name, resource.container_name],
            [completed_rpcs_aggregate: aggregate(value.completed_rpcs)] }
  | outer_join [0]
  | value [concurrent_rpcs: sub(t_0.started_rpcs_aggregate, t_1.completed_rpcs_aggregate)]

fetch k8s_container
    | metric custom.googleapis.com/opencensus/grpc.io/client/roundtrip_latency
    | group_by 1m, [roundtrip_latency_aligned: aggregate(value.roundtrip_latency)]
    | every 1m
    | group_by [], [roundtrip_latency_aggregated: aggregate(roundtrip_latency_aligned)]
    | { t_0:
          group_by [], [roundtrip_latency_stats_value: percentile(roundtrip_latency_aggregated, 50)]
            | map add[roundtrip_latency_stats_tag: '50 percentile']
      ; t_1:
          group_by [], [roundtrip_latency_stats_value: percentile(roundtrip_latency_aggregated, 95)]
            | map add[roundtrip_latency_stats_tag: '95 percentile']
      ; t_2:
          group_by [], [roundtrip_latency_stats_value: percentile(roundtrip_latency_aggregated, 99)]
            | map add[roundtrip_latency_stats_tag: '99 percentile']
      ; t_3:
          group_by [], [roundtrip_latency_stats_value: mean(roundtrip_latency_aggregated)]
            | map add[roundtrip_latency_stats_tag: 'mean']}
    | union

fetch k8s_container
  | metric custom.googleapis.com/opencensus/grpc.io/client/roundtrip_latency
  | align delta(1m)
  | every 1m
  | group_by [], [roundtrip_latency_aggregate: aggregate(value.roundtrip_latency)]

fetch k8s_container
  | metric custom.googleapis.com/opencensus/grpc.io/client/sent_compressed_message_bytes_per_rpc
  | group_by 1m, [sent_compressed_message_bytes_per_rpc_aligned: aggregate(value.sent_compressed_message_bytes_per_rpc)]
  | every 1m
  | group_by [], [sent_compressed_message_bytes_per_rpc_aggregated: aggregate(sent_compressed_message_bytes_per_rpc_aligned)]
  | { t_0:
        group_by [], [sent_compressed_message_bytes_per_rpc_stats_value: percentile(sent_compressed_message_bytes_per_rpc_aggregated, 50)]
          | map add[sent_compressed_message_bytes_per_rpc_stats_tag: '50 percentile']
    ; t_1:
        group_by [], [sent_compressed_message_bytes_per_rpc_stats_value: percentile(sent_compressed_message_bytes_per_rpc_aggregated, 95)]
          | map add[sent_compressed_message_bytes_per_rpc_stats_tag: '95 percentile']
    ; t_2:
        group_by [], [sent_compressed_message_bytes_per_rpc_stats_value: percentile(sent_compressed_message_bytes_per_rpc_aggregated, 99)]
          | map add[sent_compressed_message_bytes_per_rpc_stats_tag: '99 percentile']
    ; t_3:
        group_by [], [sent_compressed_message_bytes_per_rpc_stats_value: mean(sent_compressed_message_bytes_per_rpc_aggregated)]
          | map add[sent_compressed_message_bytes_per_rpc_stats_tag: 'mean']}
  | union

fetch k8s_container
  | metric custom.googleapis.com/opencensus/grpc.io/client/sent_compressed_message_bytes_per_rpc
  | align delta(1m)
  | every 1m
  | group_by [], [sent_compressed_message_bytes_per_rpc_aggregate: aggregate(value.sent_compressed_message_bytes_per_rpc)]

fetch k8s_container
  | metric custom.googleapis.com/opencensus/grpc.io/client/received_compressed_message_bytes_per_rpc
  | group_by 1m, [received_compressed_message_bytes_per_rpc_aligned: aggregate(value.received_compressed_message_bytes_per_rpc)]
  | every 1m
  | group_by [], [received_compressed_message_bytes_per_rpc_aggregated: aggregate(received_compressed_message_bytes_per_rpc_aligned)]
  | { t_0:
        group_by [], [received_compressed_message_bytes_per_rpc_stats_value: percentile(received_compressed_message_bytes_per_rpc_aggregated, 50)]
          | map add[received_compressed_message_bytes_per_rpc_stats_tag: '50 percentile']
    ; t_1:
        group_by [], [received_compressed_message_bytes_per_rpc_stats_value: percentile(received_compressed_message_bytes_per_rpc_aggregated, 95)]
          | map add[received_compressed_message_bytes_per_rpc_stats_tag: '95 percentile']
    ; t_2:
        group_by [], [received_compressed_message_bytes_per_rpc_stats_value: percentile(received_compressed_message_bytes_per_rpc_aggregated, 99)]
          | map add[received_compressed_message_bytes_per_rpc_stats_tag: '99 percentile']
    ; t_3:
        group_by [], [received_compressed_message_bytes_per_rpc_stats_value: mean(received_compressed_message_bytes_per_rpc_aggregated)]
          | map add[received_compressed_message_bytes_per_rpc_stats_tag: 'mean']}
  | union

fetch k8s_container
  | metric custom.googleapis.com/opencensus/grpc.io/client/received_compressed_message_bytes_per_rpc
  | align delta(1m)
  | every 1m
  | group_by [], [received_compressed_message_bytes_per_rpc_aggregate: aggregate(value.received_compressed_message_bytes_per_rpc)]

fetch k8s_container
  | metric 'custom.googleapis.com/opencensus/grpc.io/server/completed_rpcs'
  | filter (metric.grpc_server_status == 'OK')
  | align rate(1m)
  | every 1m
  | group_by
      [resource.project_id, resource.cluster_name, resource.namespace_name, resource.container_name],
      [completed_rpcs_aggregate: aggregate(value.completed_rpcs)]

fetch k8s_container
  | metric 'custom.googleapis.com/opencensus/grpc.io/server/completed_rpcs'
  | filter (metric.grpc_server_status != 'OK')
  | align rate(1m)
  | every 1m
  | group_by
      [resource.project_id, resource.cluster_name, resource.namespace_name, resource.container_name],
      [completed_error_rpcs_aggregate: aggregate(value.completed_rpcs)]

fetch k8s_container
  | metric 'custom.googleapis.com/opencensus/grpc.io/server/completed_rpcs'
  | align delta(1m)
  | every 1m
  | group_by
      [resource.project_id, resource.cluster_name, resource.namespace_name, resource.container_name],
      [error_percentage_aggregate: sum(if(metric.grpc_server_status != 'OK', value.completed_rpcs, 0)) * 100 / sum(value.completed_rpcs)]

fetch k8s_container
  | { t_0:
      metric 'custom.googleapis.com/opencensus/grpc.io/server/started_rpcs'
        | align delta(1m)
        | every 1m
        | group_by
            [resource.project_id, resource.cluster_name, resource.namespace_name, resource.container_name],
            [started_rpcs_aggregate: aggregate(value.started_rpcs)]
      ; t_1:
      metric 'custom.googleapis.com/opencensus/grpc.io/server/completed_rpcs'
        | align delta(1m)
        | every 1m
        | group_by
            [resource.project_id, resource.cluster_name, resource.namespace_name, resource.container_name],
            [completed_rpcs_aggregate: aggregate(value.completed_rpcs)] }
  | outer_join [0]
  | value [concurrent_rpcs: sub(t_0.started_rpcs_aggregate, t_1.completed_rpcs_aggregate)]

fetch k8s_container
    | metric custom.googleapis.com/opencensus/grpc.io/server/server_latency
    | group_by 1m, [server_latency_aligned: aggregate(value.server_latency)]
    | every 1m
    | group_by [], [server_latency_aggregated: aggregate(server_latency_aligned)]
    | { t_0:
          group_by [], [server_latency_stats_value: percentile(server_latency_aggregated, 50)]
            | map add[server_latency_stats_tag: '50 percentile']
      ; t_1:
          group_by [], [server_latency_stats_value: percentile(server_latency_aggregated, 95)]
            | map add[server_latency_stats_tag: '95 percentile']
      ; t_2:
          group_by [], [server_latency_stats_value: percentile(server_latency_aggregated, 99)]
            | map add[server_latency_stats_tag: '99 percentile']
      ; t_3:
          group_by [], [server_latency_stats_value: mean(server_latency_aggregated)]
            | map add[server_latency_stats_tag: 'mean']}
    | union

fetch k8s_container
  | metric custom.googleapis.com/opencensus/grpc.io/server/server_latency
  | align delta(1m)
  | every 1m
  | group_by [], [server_latency_aggregate: aggregate(value.server_latency)]

fetch k8s_container
  | metric custom.googleapis.com/opencensus/grpc.io/server/sent_compressed_message_bytes_per_rpc
  | group_by 1m, [sent_compressed_message_bytes_per_rpc_aligned: aggregate(value.sent_compressed_message_bytes_per_rpc)]
  | every 1m
  | group_by [], [sent_compressed_message_bytes_per_rpc_aggregated: aggregate(sent_compressed_message_bytes_per_rpc_aligned)]
  | { t_0:
        group_by [], [sent_compressed_message_bytes_per_rpc_stats_value: percentile(sent_compressed_message_bytes_per_rpc_aggregated, 50)]
          | map add[sent_compressed_message_bytes_per_rpc_stats_tag: '50 percentile']
    ; t_1:
        group_by [], [sent_compressed_message_bytes_per_rpc_stats_value: percentile(sent_compressed_message_bytes_per_rpc_aggregated, 95)]
          | map add[sent_compressed_message_bytes_per_rpc_stats_tag: '95 percentile']
    ; t_2:
        group_by [], [sent_compressed_message_bytes_per_rpc_stats_value: percentile(sent_compressed_message_bytes_per_rpc_aggregated, 99)]
          | map add[sent_compressed_message_bytes_per_rpc_stats_tag: '99 percentile']
    ; t_3:
        group_by [], [sent_compressed_message_bytes_per_rpc_stats_value: mean(sent_compressed_message_bytes_per_rpc_aggregated)]
          | map add[sent_compressed_message_bytes_per_rpc_stats_tag: 'mean']}
  | union

fetch k8s_container
  | metric custom.googleapis.com/opencensus/grpc.io/server/sent_compressed_message_bytes_per_rpc
  | align delta(1m)
  | every 1m
  | group_by [], [sent_compressed_message_bytes_per_rpc_aggregate: aggregate(value.sent_compressed_message_bytes_per_rpc)]

fetch k8s_container
  | metric custom.googleapis.com/opencensus/grpc.io/server/received_compressed_message_bytes_per_rpc
  | group_by 1m, [received_compressed_message_bytes_per_rpc_aligned: aggregate(value.received_compressed_message_bytes_per_rpc)]
  | every 1m
  | group_by [], [received_compressed_message_bytes_per_rpc_aggregated: aggregate(received_compressed_message_bytes_per_rpc_aligned)]
  | { t_0:
        group_by [], [received_compressed_message_bytes_per_rpc_stats_value: percentile(received_compressed_message_bytes_per_rpc_aggregated, 50)]
          | map add[received_compressed_message_bytes_per_rpc_stats_tag: '50 percentile']
    ; t_1:
        group_by [], [received_compressed_message_bytes_per_rpc_stats_value: percentile(received_compressed_message_bytes_per_rpc_aggregated, 95)]
          | map add[received_compressed_message_bytes_per_rpc_stats_tag: '95 percentile']
    ; t_2:
        group_by [], [received_compressed_message_bytes_per_rpc_stats_value: percentile(received_compressed_message_bytes_per_rpc_aggregated, 99)]
          | map add[received_compressed_message_bytes_per_rpc_stats_tag: '99 percentile']
    ; t_3:
        group_by [], [received_compressed_message_bytes_per_rpc_stats_value: mean(received_compressed_message_bytes_per_rpc_aggregated)]
          | map add[received_compressed_message_bytes_per_rpc_stats_tag: 'mean']}
  | union

fetch k8s_container
  | metric custom.googleapis.com/opencensus/grpc.io/server/received_compressed_message_bytes_per_rpc
  | align delta(1m)
  | every 1m
  | group_by [], [received_compressed_message_bytes_per_rpc_aggregate: aggregate(value.received_compressed_message_bytes_per_rpc)]
